description.p: Shows the XForms text controls: textfield, password textfield and text area.

ol.li: The first time you load this page, the first two checkboxes are selected. This is because they are both listed in the XForms Model and are therefore considered as default values.

If you change the checkbox selection and submit the form, the page is displayed again and the checkboxes are automatically populated per your selection. The includes the case where you have unselected all the checkboxes before submitting the form.

description.p: Note: This example uses checkboxes, but the same logic applies to all the XForms controls.
